title: Andalusian Bean and Orange salad
ingredients: ['1 x 300g can cannellini beans, drained', '2 oranges, peeled and segmented', '1/2 cucumber, chopped', '2 medium vine tomatoes, deseeded and chopped', '1 green pepper, deseeded and chopped', '3 tbsp olive oil', '1 tbsp sherry vinegar', 'salt and black pepper', 'pinch of cinnamon']
